# Draft:Smartware Innovation

Smartware Innovation is a Nigerian technology company that provides web development, custom software solutions, and digital marketing services tailored for small and medium-sized businesses. Headquartered in Lekki, Lagos State, the company specializes in helping online vendors and local businesses build scalable digital platforms that drive sales and growth.
History
The company was originally founded in late 2019 under the name Smartweb Services by Rasheed Muraina, the company focused on creating affordable websites for local enterprises. In 2020, the company rebranded as Smart Innovation Technology, reflecting an expansion into mobile app development and digital strategy services.
On 21 November 2021, the business was formally registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) in Nigeria as Smartware Innovation (RC: [Insert RC number when available]), marking its official incorporation and operational launch under the new name.
Services
Smartware Innovation offers a broad range of technology-driven services, including:
* Website development: Custom-built e-commerce and business websites optimized for conversions and SEO.
* Mobile app development: Native and hybrid mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms.
* Digital marketing: Campaign strategy, search engine optimization (SEO), social media advertising, and sales funnels.
* Training & empowerment: Workshops and digital training programs for small business owners and aspiring developers.
* Custom WordPress solutions: Including blog integration, news site customization, and online store plugins.
Operations
The company primarily serves small-scale businesses in Nigeria, particularly online vendors operating on platforms like Instagram, Facebook Marketplace, and TikTok. Its outreach strategy includes direct engagement, demo site previews, and tailored landing pages that meet the specific needs of online entrepreneurs without websites.
Smartware Innovation has launched over 500 websites and digital solutions as of 2024, focusing on affordability, mobile responsiveness, and lead generation for African businesses transitioning into the digital economy.
